entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow or ice pellets beginning this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow or ice pellets early in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
